statements: DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND status = 'Inactive';
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' AND status = 'Out for Delivery';
DELETE FROM status_table WHERE vehicle_id = 54321 AND status = 'inactive';
DELETE FROM location_table WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM status_table WHERE status = 'out_of_service');
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE location = 'New York' AND status = 'Available';
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 101 OR driver_id = 102;
DELETE FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE status='Out for Delivery';
DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM delivery_vehicles WHERE vehicle_name='Truck A');
DELETE FROM Orders WHERE driver_id IN (SELECT driver_id FROM Drivers WHERE vehicle_id = 123);
DELETE FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id NOT IN (SELECT driver_id FROM Orders);
